about_the_game:
CYBER-ASSASSIN™ is an action packed third-person game currently in development by solo developer -CyberWave-, combining hack and slash with shooter mechanics. Join the assassin himself in an epic single player campaign set in a dark, futuristic world where science fiction meets the gritty edge of cyberpunk.

The Ultimate Killing Machine


Once a skilled soldier, a man is transformed into a cybernetic assassin known as X01 after undergoing brutal experiments conducted by the powerful corporation, Zenith. In a twist of fate, he breaks free from their control and sets out to destroy those who turned him into a weapon. With his memories erased by the experiments, X01 is driven not only by a thirst for vengeance but also by a desire to uncover the secrets of his lost past and expose the dark truths behind Zenith.

Gameplay


This game combines hack-and-slash combat with tactical shooter gameplay. Engage in intense, close-quarters combat, where you can perform combos, unlock new skills, and execute brutal kills to replenish your health. When the fight moves to a distance, switch to a tactical shooter style, with a diverse arsenal of weapons to choose from, helping you even the odds against your enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: CYBER-ASSASSIN™ will contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, and Strong Language.
